attributes.action: 'Honour' ALL of our winning Olympic Gold Medalists.
attributes.background:
Missing honours:
1988 Men's hockey squad (3 honoured already)
1984 Cox of men’s coxed four, Adrian Ellison
1976 Modern pentathletes Danny Nightingale and Adrian Parker
1972 Equestrian eventing team, Mark Phillips, Bridget Parker
1956 Fencing: Gillian Sheen (Britain’s only ever fencing gold)

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
